name: Jay's Awesome MVP Game
description:
Jay's Awesome MVP Game is a minimal viable product demo made with Unreal Engine 4 in September 2020. Featuring Unreal Guy on a mysterious island, faced with a devastating countdown timer and the impossible mission of having to collect 20 scary purple objects. Can you help him before time runs out?

Initial 1.0 release, featuring

  • a button that opens a door (Blueprint relationship)
  • several HUDs (graphic overlays)
  • a countdown timer
  • a score counter
  • a menu system (start/pause/success/game over)
  • an intro cinematic
  • music and sound effects
  • interactive water (courtesy of UIWS)

This was a test project that taught me a lot about Unreal Engine, using free Starter Content and Mathew Wadstein's knowledge (thanks Mat!)

With this release I'm trying out Itch for my other playable demos, and it felt only right to include this project here to live among the many things that may come in the future.

Enjoy and Have Fun!
